longInfo:
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission and transit refused to nationals of Israel
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P. vivax
  and very limited risk due to P. falciparum exists from March
  to November in rural areas of the provinces of Hormozgan and
  Kerman (tropical part) and the southern part of
  Sistan-Baluchestan. Recommended prevention in risk areas: C.
